transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Hi sir, good morning. Pradeep Kumar Panda ji baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan ji bilkul.
Executive: Okay. Sir, mera naam Prashant Gupta hai. Main IndiaMART head office Noida se baat kar raha hun. Prashant ka manager.
Customer: Kahan se kahan se? Prashant?
Executive: Haan ji, Prashant Gupta, IndiaMART head office Noida.
Customer: Prashant Gupta IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Achha haan.
Executive: Ji, ji. Actually Muskan jo aapke account manager hain, woh kaafi time se leave par hain. Isliye maine aapko call kiya hai sir. Last discussion hua tha aapka aur unka. Aapne kuch product apne delete karwaye the, kuch new planning thi aapke product se related.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Toh woh abhi tak aapne add wagera. Mere ko ek kam kariye, mere ko abhi wohi yeh 5 o'clock, 4:30 tak phone kariye, main baat karunga. Abhi thoda sa main busy hun.
Executive: Okay, sir, main abhi baat
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and requests a callback.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4:30 or 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, product deletion, product planning
